page.title: 11Places on Worship.
page.content: Places of worship in our area:- {C of England (2) Evangelical Church {Methodist (5) House Church Group {Roman Catholic Jehovah's Witness {Wesleyan Reform Plymouth Brethren The area offers the residents a wide variety of places of worship but all christian organisations. Many of the churches are very much the{'local' church, especially Burncross Methodist where people attend because it is the only church nearby. The community is well provided for by many organisations using the churches as meeting places.The churches are{very {keen that they be seen as working {together}and not as totally seperate organisations. This is done by St.Johns (Church of England) and Chapeltown methodist holding regular united services.
